metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9749 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The *regs* macros in opcodes/bfin-dis.c in GNU Binutils 2.28 allow remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file,as demonstrated by mishandling of this file during "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
